member.name: SHREGENUM_FLAGS
member.summary: Provides a set of values that indicate the base key that will be used for an enumeration.

member.name: SHREGENUM_FLAGS.SHREGENUM_DEFAULT
member.summary: Enumerates under HKEY_CURRENT_USER, or, if the specified item is not found in HKEY_CURRENT_USER, enumerates under HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE.
